simulator.payloads
Class CanMailbox

java.lang.Object
  simulator.payloads.Payload
      simulator.payloads.CanMailbox
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Payload>
public final class CanMailbox
extends Payload

CanMailbox is the Payload object that is used by the elevator.framework.CANNetwork. It implements a bit-level representation of the CAN message, including the CAN message ID and a binary payload of up to 8 bytes. This class also provides the utility methods necessary to compute bit-stuffing over the actual binary representation of the message.

Constructor Detail

CanMailbox

CanMailbox(CanMailbox p)
Copy constructor

Parameters:
p - the CanMailbox to copy.

CanMailbox

CanMailbox(int messageId)
Create a new CAN payload with the specified ID and payload size. Since CAN headers are 29 bits long, only the 29 least significant bits of the message ID are used.

Parameters:
messageId - the message ID
payloadSize - the size of the payload in bytes
